extension.description: Nestopia is a portable open source NES/Famicom emulator. It is designed to be as accurate as possible and supports a large number of peripherals. The hardware is emulated at cycle-by-cycle granularity, ensuring full support for software that does mid-scanline and other timing trickery.[CR][CR]Nestopia Undead is a fork of the original source code, plus R. Belmont's Linux port overlay, all included in one convenient source tree with enhancements.[CR][CR]Source: https://github.com/libretro/nestopia
